publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6213 Bruce Crawford: Interpretation and Legislative Reform (Scotland) Billâ€”That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Interpretation and Legislative Reform (Scotland) Bill, debate on groups of amendments shall, subject to Rule 9.8.4A, be brought to a conclusion by the time limits indicated, each time limit being calculated from when the Stage begins and excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when a meeting of the Parliament is suspended (other than a suspension following the first division in the Stage being called) or otherwise not in progress: Groups 1 to 3: 25 minutes Groups 4 to 7: 45 minutes. Supported by: Fiona Hyslop*
